items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

items.content_html: askFlow is a lightweight internal tool for managing projects and tasks. It provides a simple and intuitive interface for tracking work across multiple projects, with features like a Kanban board, task priorities, due dates, and more.

items.content_html: A lightweight, scalable TypeScript service to manage RSVP responses for events on the Gametime Hero platform. Supports adding/updating player RSVP statuses ("Yes", "No", "Maybe"), retrieving confirmed attendees, and counting total, confirmed, and declined responses.
items.title: SaisumanthT/RSVP-TeamManager: A lightweight, scalable TypeScript service to manage RSVP responses for events on the Gametime Hero platform. Supports adding/updating player RSVP statuses ("Yes", "No", "Maybe"), retrieving confirmed attendees, and counting total, confirmed, and declined responses.
